I have uploaded a new pic to the "Single Originals" section-- a pic 
of Yuki, after the timeline change in "Jidai Monogatari".

By the way, the reason that she has the two dots high on her forehead 
is because that was part of the makeup worn by the Imperial 
courtiers. Since, in the new timeline, she's a granddaughter of the 
previous emperor, she'd wear her makeup like that for formal 
functions, like what happens at the end of the story...

But I'll save that for later...^_^...(smiles mysteriously) All I 
gotta say for now, though, is to Choshuu: Don't be so sure that 
you're going to still end up winning...

--M.
